mapper.select: select U.USER_ID, U.LOGIN_NAME, U.FULL_NAME, U.PASSWORD, U.AUTH_TICKET, U.ROAD_NO,U.STATION_NO, U.MOBILE, U.STATUS, U.CREATE_TIME, U.CREATE_USER, U.UPDATE_TIME, U.UPDATE_USER,U.IS_ADMIN,R.ROAD_NAME,S.STATION_NAME from TB_SYS_USER U LEFT JOIN TB_ROAD R ON U.ROAD_NO = R.ROAD_NO LEFT JOIN TB_STATION S ON U.STATION_NO = S.STATION_NO where U.USER_ID = #{userId}

select count(*) from TB_SYS_USER where LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName}
